originalText.text:
A very clumsy job. My painting is broken in different places and completely glued to the base, making it impossible to transfer it to another base.
If your work is delicate or the piece you're planning to frame is delicate, avoid taking it to that place. NEVER!

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience working with Tan at Framebridge! Their expertise and attention to detail really stood out. Tan helped me choose the perfect frame for my artwork, and the final result exceeded my expectations. Their friendly and patient approach made the whole process enjoyable. I highly recommend Tan for anyone looking for exceptional service at Framebridge.

text.text: I had a fantastic experience working with Tan at Framebridge! Their expertise and attention to detail really stood out. Tan helped me choose the perfect frame for my artwork, and the final result exceeded my expectations. Their friendly and patient approach made the whole process enjoyable. I highly recommend Tan for anyone looking for exceptional service at Framebridge.

originalText.text:
My review is based upon having to return my artwork twice (original pieces, with very high sentimental value).
I will update the review once Framebridge returns my piece for the 3rd time and is dependent on how customer service deals with the issue.
My wife selected Framebridge over a competitor in the trust that Framebridge would be the better bet, but...
We handed over our original pieces to be framed, they were turned around very quickly ~5 days.

The frame arrived but with the artworks wonky.
My wife took the frame back to be rectified, of course we already were disappointed to have to return. The staff in the store recognized immediately that there was an issue and committed to fox the issue for us.
The frame arrived again very quickly ~4/5 days, but again there was a new issue.
This time the prints had been switched around, despite us receiving a picture via email of the prints the right way round the day before.

Off we went back to the store to return for the 2nd time, to be told they will fix it and make sure to check in the store it's correct first before sending it out to us.
Be aware that the policy of Framebridge is to be able to fix your piece 3 times before they discuss compensation with you.
All the while original art pieces are being handled multiple times by a studio which seems to be priding itself on speed rather than accuracy.

We agree with the other 1* reviews in that if you are sending original pieces, be aware it may be handled multiple times and with possibility of inaccurate delivered product. Probably best to proceed by de copies If you can.

We will update the review once we have been through customer service discussions.

originalText.text: This place is amazing. They do a great job and pricing is transparent. No surprises. We have frame two really oversize pieces for our living room, two large pieces for our bedroom, and some smaller pieces to fill the walls and they all look amazing. Keith helped us and he is very knowledgable and helpful.

text.text: This place is amazing. They do a great job and pricing is transparent. No surprises. We have frame two really oversize pieces for our living room, two large pieces for our bedroom, and some smaller pieces to fill the walls and they all look amazing. Keith helped us and he is very knowledgable and helpful.

originalText.text: Tan is amazing!! He made the whole process of framing a dream. He is very helpful picking out frames/matte and knowledgeable of the overall product. Plus he was genuinely interested in the art I brought in.
